content.question: Which of the following best explains why farmers would plant both strawberries and watermelons in the same field?

choices.label: Limited farmland encourages intensive farming and monocropping to produce high yields.
Unlimited farmland encourages intensive farming with intercropping to produce high yields.
Unlimited farmland encourages extensive farming with intercropping to produce high yields.
Limited farmland encourages extensive farming with monocropping to produce high yields.
Limited farmland encourages intensive farming with intercropping to produce high yields.

content.answer: Limited farmland encourages intensive farming with intercropping to produce high yields.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Explain the degree to which a geographic concept, process, model, or theory effectively explains geographic effects in different contexts and regions of the world.
